synopsis.text: As they traverse the winding roads of the north, seasoned merchant Kraft Lawrence and his cunning, wolf-deity companion Holo forge ahead in search of her long-lost home, Yoitsu. Along their journey, they strike deals, face adversity, and forge a tender bond that blossoms into a deep connection. As they encounter religious zealots, rival merchants, and risky business ventures, Lawrence's dream of becoming a shop owner and his relationship with Holo are put to the test. With each passing day, Lawrence grapples with the possibility of parting ways with Holo, even as their journey together reveals that there's more to life than just profits and trade.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
